description:
We tracked this storm for 2 hours in Central Texas. It started in Evant, Tx and once the storm hit an outflow boundary...it exploded. The tornado became an EF2, rain-wrapped, cone tornado. 

Filmed by Jeff Mangum
Twitter: @TornadoTrackers

Close-range, brief tornado crosses the road and tears apart a tree east of Lawton, OK in the town of Central High.

For licensing inquiries, contact media@livestormsnow.com or visit http://www.livestormsmedia.com/

Tornado Trackers is made up of storm chasers Jeff Mangum, Jeremy Hamann, and Gabe Cox.

Video highlighting the relentless effects of the wind and THREE separate high tide cycles over the course of two days, in the Massachusetts towns of Winthrop, Quincy and Hull, while a massive and destructive low pressure system bombed off of the US east coast. Filmed March 2-3, 2018.

Tornado Trackers is made up of storm chasers Jeff Mangum, Jeremy Hamann, and Gabe Cox.

Listen to the Tornado Trackers Podcast! Available on your favorite podcast app:
Spotify: https://spoti.fi/3sohMi5 
Apple: https://apple.co/3bsUX5O
Google: https://bit.ly/3bBq2nX

Raw, UHD footage of the May 9, 2016 Katie / Wynnewood tornado in Oklahoma. 

Shot on the iPhone 6S...seriously!

Video of the Selden, KS tornado as it moved into town. Thankfully everyone in town came out safe along with the truck driver at the end of the video. An intense chase day to say the least!

Extended 4K UHD cut with reduced watermark available soon on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/tornadotrackers

On May 16, 2017 we documented a stunning tornado near McLean, TX . Accompanying the tornado was large baseball and softball sized hail throughout. Our windshield finally had enough.

Incredible close-range footage from tornadoes that struck the towns of Eckley and Wray, Colorado on May 7, 2016. The Wray close encounter definitely makes it into our personal Top 5 Tornado Videos. This incredible storm chase landed us 100 yards away from the tornado as it traveled down the road away from us.

This glorious looking supercell spun harmlessly until it produced a destructive and fatal EF2 tornado that hit the town of Elk City, Oklahoma on May 16, 2017

Two tornadoes near the town of Abernathy, TX kicked off the storm chasing season for our team. It was the first of many chases for 2021. Video includes a time lapse of the second tornadoes life-cycle.

A long-lived supercell tracked through Central Texas on March 24, 2021, producing a tornado near the town of Hamilton, TX. Our team tracked with the storm for several hours documenting the storms structure and brief tornado.

May 17, 2019: A beautiful cone tornado touched down in open country east of Fort Stockton, TX where it sat nearly stationary just south of I-10. There have been no reports of structures impacted by the tornado.

Our team member Gabe Cox provided a live FB update as the eyewall and most intense winds from Hurricane Florence sat over Wilmington, NC early Friday morning. Moments after finishing the live video, a strip of metal from the parking garage roof came crashing down beside our chase vehicle, which is why we wear a safety helmet when out documenting!
